item.title: Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs
item.description:
Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs

In his four years as creative director of Saint Laurent, Hedi Slimane managed to craft a highly compelling vision for the French house, one that gave louche Parisian elegance a distinctive rock 'n' roll beat.

item.title: Jennifer Aniston on Her Biggest Beauty Regret-And Why Easy Always Does It
item.description:
Jennifer Aniston on Her Biggest Beauty Regret-And Why Easy Always Does It

Two decades have passed since Jennifer Aniston burst onto the scene and became a reigning '90s beauty icon, thanks to that shining blonde hair and sun-kissed skin captured weekly on Friends. Since then, the 47-year-old actress has kept the preternatural glow and easygoing charm that made her a star, but more recently, has seen her life head in a new direction.
